slides.title: Lead Capture
slides.narration: Most website visitors leave without contacting you. They were interested enough to visit, but something stopped them from reaching out. Lead capture fixes that—give them easy ways to connect before they leave.

slides.title: Lead Capture Methods
slides.narration: Multiple ways to capture leads. Contact forms for direct inquiries. Chat widgets for immediate questions. Lead magnets offering value in exchange for email. Exit popups as a last chance. Callback requests for phone-preferred customers. Use several for maximum capture.

slides.title: Step 1: Contact Form

content.ideal: Name, email, phone, message = 4 fields max

slides.narration: Start with your contact form. Fewer fields equals more submissions—every field reduces completion rates. Ask only what you actually need. Make the submit button compelling—not 'Submit' but 'Get Your Quote' or 'Start the Conversation.' Confirm submission clearly so they know it worked.

slides.title: Step 2: Chat Widget

benefits: Captures leads who won't fill forms

slides.narration: Add a chat widget. It provides immediate answers to questions—lower barrier than filling out forms. Captures leads who wouldn't complete a form. AI can handle inquiries after hours so you never miss an opportunity. Place it bottom right corner on all pages.

slides.title: Step 3: Lead Magnet

content.formula: Value offered > perceived effort to get it

slides.narration: Create a lead magnet—something valuable in exchange for their email. Free guides or checklists. Discount codes. Free consultations. Helpful resources they'd actually use. The value offered must exceed the perceived effort to get it. Make it irresistible.

slides.title: Step 4: Exit Intent

popup.example: Before you go—get 10% off your first visit

slides.narration: Exit intent popups catch visitors as they're leaving. When their mouse moves toward the close button, show a compelling offer. Last chance to capture them. 'Before you go—get ten percent off your first visit.' Makes them pause and reconsider.

slides.title: Pro Tips

tips: Respond to leads within 5 minutes for best conversion
Set up auto-responses so they know you received it
Track which sources bring best leads
A/B test your forms and popups

slides.narration: Lead capture pro tips. Respond within five minutes for best conversion—speed matters enormously. Set up auto-responses so they know you received their inquiry. Track which sources bring your best leads. A/B test your forms and popups to optimize over time.

slides.title: Start Capturing
slides.narration: Ready to capture more leads? Set up your lead capture tools now. Or get lead magnet ideas if you need inspiration for what to offer. Every visitor is a potential customer—start capturing them.
